// Updated React single‑page portfolio for Pranav Dhruv Tandon // ‑‑ 2025‑05‑05 refresh: new positioning, skills, and copy import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-scroll'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [scrollPosition, setScrollPosition] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrollPosition(window.scrollY); window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const toggleMenu = () => setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); return (
{/* ───────────────────────── NAV */}
50 ? 'bg-white shadow-md py-3' : 'bg-transparent py-5' }`} >
50 ? 'text-primary' : 'text-white'}`} > Pranav Dhruv Tandon {/* desktop links */}
{['about', 'stealth', 'skills', 'experience', 'testimonials', 'contact'].map((s) => ( 50 ? 'text-dark' : 'text-white' }`} > {s === 'about' ? 'About' : s === 'stealth' ? 'Stealth Mode' : s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)} ))}
{/* mobile button */}
{/* mobile links */} {isMenuOpen && (
{['about', 'stealth', 'skills', 'experience', 'testimonials', 'contact'].map((s) => ( setIsMenuOpen(false)} className="text-dark hover:text-primary transition-colors" > {s === 'about' ? 'About' : s === 'stealth' ? 'Stealth Mode' : s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)} ))}
)}
{/* ───────────────────────── HERO */}

Pranav Dhruv Tandon

AI Consultant • Bioinformatics Builder • Deep‑Tech Investor

I design Retrieval‑Augmented Generation pipelines and vector‑embedding systems that ground large‑language models in real‑world data—then translate those breakthroughs into scalable products and bottom‑line results.

Learn More Get in Touch
{/* ───────────────────────── ABOUT */}

About Me

I’m an AI‑first problem‑solver who pairs bleeding‑edge research—RAG, semantic chunking, agentic orchestration—with pragmatic business execution. My toolkit spans Python/Kubernetes MLOps, bioinformatics pipelines, and full‑stack cloud apps. Past wins: +350 % SaaS engagement at CodeCertain.ai, $800 k real‑estate raise at M3S Services, and an 18–23 % annualized return on a $450 k public‑markets portfolio.

{['RAG Architect', 'Vector DBs', 'Kubernetes', 'Bioinformatics', 'Strategic Investor', 'Team Builder'].map( (tag) => ( {tag} ), )}
{/* ───────────────────────── STEALTH MODE */}

Why Stealth Mode?

I’m incubating AI + bio‑data tools under the radar—protecting IP and timing the market for maximum first‑mover advantage.

{/* four cards retained verbatim */} {/* approach lists */}

My Approach in Stealth Mode

  • Designing agentic RAG stacks with versioned knowledge graphs
  • Running IP‑first diligence and provisional‑patent sprints
  • Quietly onboarding lighthouse customers under strict NDAs
  • Securing intellectual‑property frameworks
  • Developing go‑to‑market strategies timed for maximum impact
{/* ───────────────────────── SKILLS */}

Technical Skills & Expertise

{/* ───────────────────────── EXPERIENCE (blurbs shortened) */}

Experience & Achievements

{/* CodeCertain */}

CodeCertain.ai

AI Consultant & Lead Developer

Led RAG‑powered static‑analysis engine; slashed false‑positive bug reports 30 % and drove 350 % lift in weekly active users.

{['RAG', 'Vector Embeddings', 'MCP', 'AI Optimisation'].map((t) => ( {t} ))}
{/* M3S */}

M3S Services

Lead Investment Strategist

Raised $800 k and navigated permitting for a Vancouver triplex; modeled 23 % IRR, breaking ground Q4 2025.

{['Real Estate', 'Capital Raising', 'Strategic Planning'].map((t) => ( {t} ))}
{/* Portfolio */}

Portfolio Management

Independent Investor

Self‑managed $450 k across US/CA/IN markets, compounding 18–23 % p.a. via Buffett‑style fundamentals and ML‑assisted screeners.

{['Portfolio', 'Algorithmic Trading', 'Financial Analysis'].map((t) => ( {t} ))}

Xneelo & Molecular You

Bioinformatics Specialist

Docker→K8s migration (‑32 % cloud cost) & 250‑biomarker health report; filed internal patent for dynamic reference‑range algorithm.

Resident Advisor
